snippet.title: Two Point Hospital: A Stitch in Time | Launch Trailer | OUT NOW
snippet.description:
Two Point Hospital: A Stitch in Time is OUT NOW on Steam! 

Break through the greatest medical frontier of all: space-time! Leverage portals to burst into pre-historic, medieval and futuristic time eras. 

Send patients through time portals, and treat anachronistic ailments. 

Join superstar time-hero Captain Yesterday on his greatest adventure yet!

Grab yourself a copy here - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1498090/Two_Point_Hospital__A_Stitch_in_Time
